message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $18,000, which is a fair price considering its value to you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that $12,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $16,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $15,000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $15,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.
